sections.title: Vintage
sections.description: Our Vintage Collection is a nod to the past through charming retro design details and finishing details.

sections.title: Excellence
sections.description: Explore our modern collection designed for sleek and contemporary kitchens with advanced technology. Our Excellence Collection takes its inspiration from professional kitchens with a sleek shape and streamlined look.

sections.title: Fusion
sections.description: Soft lines and rounded edges distinguish the Fusion Collection where they coexist in perfect harmony with functional needs.

sections.title: Classic
sections.description: The Classic Collection combines both cast-iron radiant heat cooking and conventional cooking, giving you the flexibility to choose your favorite way of cooking every day.

company.title: BULM Italy SRL
description: BULM Italy SpA is a distinguished Italian company specializing in the design and production of high-end home appliances. Founded in 1979 in Milan, the brand has become a symbol of craftsmanship, innovation, and timeless elegance.

What began as a small manufacturing workshop driven by passion and precision, evolved into an international benchmark for quality. For over four decades, BULM has been redefining the modern cooking experience through cutting-edge technology, refined aesthetics, and unmatched performance.

Every BULM product is born from a deep understanding of Italian design — attention to detail, excellence in materials, and a commitment to functionality. Today, the brand continues to create intelligent kitchen solutions that blend tradition with innovation.

meta.title: Contact BULM Italy – Reach Out for Inquiries and Support

collections.title: Unique Collections.
collections.subtitle: Distinctive lines
collections.description: Talent for cooking also means being able to satisfy everyone with the several requirements arising from different cultures and approaches to cooking. For this reason, Elba offers the widest range of cooker appliances. Discover your best style for your kitchen with Elba Collections.

sections.title: Collection Cookers
sections.description: Collection Cookers In Elba freestanding cookers we have therefore combined the functionality of technology with an attractive aesthetic, to create a welcoming and stimulating ambiance. Innovation and tradition are perfectly balanced in our designs, the result of years of experience in the field, creating flagship products for our business.

sections.title: Collection hobs
sections.description: There are classic gas, gas on glass and induction Elba hobs, with four or more burners and even smaller sized or traditional-looking hobs. All Elba hobs are made with top-quality materials and therefore always give above standard results. All are equipped with features for increased safety and performance, such as for example, in induction hobs, a booster function for rapid cooking times and reduced energy consumption.

sections.title: Collection ovens
sections.description: We have ovens for specific uses, such as for meat, pizza, bread, cakes and leavened products. There is a right Elba oven for everybody because we want everyone to be able to show the best of their talents for cooking.

blackLine.title: BULM Black Line – Precision Meets Elegance
blackLine.subtitle: Discover the essence of Italian engineering and refined aesthetics with the BULM Black Line. A premium collection of built-in kitchen appliances created for those who demand performance, elegance, and cutting-edge innovation — all in one.

sections.title: Built-in Electric Multifunction Oven
sections.description: Packed with multiple innovative features, this oven offers a professional culinary experience. With 11 modes including Air Fry, Pizza 300°C, Easy Steam, and Booster for fast preheating, it redefines home cooking.

sections.title: Combi Microwave 45cm
sections.description: Grill, bake, roast, and more — all in one efficient unit with 13 functions and preset auto menus for everyday recipes like vegetables, pizza, or soups. Designed to match any modern kitchen.

sections.title: Coffee & Cappuccino Maker
sections.description: Enjoy barista-style coffee at home. This elegant appliance is designed to brew rich espresso and creamy cappuccinos at the touch of a button — combining Italian tradition with modern convenience.

sections.title: Warming Drawer
sections.description: A stylish addition to your kitchen, perfect for preheating dishes or keeping meals warm before serving. Fully aligned with the Black Line design language by BULM.

meta.title: Black Line Collection | BULM Italy – Built-in Kitchen Elegance
meta.description: Discover BULM's Black Line collection: built-in ovens, microwaves, coffee machines, and warming drawers. Italian design and cutting-edge technology in your kitchen.
meta.keywords: BULM Black Line, built-in appliances, Italian kitchen appliances, modern oven, multifunction oven, microwave, warming drawer, coffee machine
meta.ogDescription: Explore the Black Line by BULM — a collection of premium built-in appliances blending performance and Italian elegance.
meta.twitterDescription: BULM Black Line is a collection of elegant, innovative, and built-in kitchen appliances crafted in Italy.

collectionsCookers.title: Built-in
collectionsCookers.subtitle: ovens. Distinctive
collectionsCookers.description: Built-in ovens. Distinctive Italian design and technology. Exclusive aesthetics, superb quality and design are the ingredients that make BULM built-in ovens unique. With their iconic design, BULM collections offer a refined blend of advanced cooking features. BULM models, available in two widths, 60cm and 90cm, are gas or electric multifunction, offering a safe and efficient way to cook with special functions such as Easy Steam, true fan cooking and many others.

excellence.description: Explore our modern collection designed for sleek and contemporary kitchens with advanced technology. Our Excellence Collection takes its inspiration from professional kitchens with a sleek shape and streamlined look.

fusion.title: Fusion
fusion.description: Soft lines and rounded edges distinguish the Fusion Collection where they coexist in perfect harmony with functional needs.

classic.title: Classic
classic.description: The Classic Collection combines both cast-iron radiant heat cooking and conventional cooking, giving you the flexibility to choose every day your favorite way of cooking.

meta.title: BULM Vintage Cookers | Retro Italian Freestanding Ranges
meta.description: Discover the BULM Vintage Collection — classic Italian freestanding cookers with retro charm and modern performance. Dual fuel and gas oven options available.
meta.keywords: vintage cookers, BULM vintage, retro kitchen appliances, dual fuel ranges, freestanding gas cookers, Italian cooking design
meta.ogTitle: BULM Vintage Cookers | Retro Italian Freestanding Ranges
meta.ogDescription: BULM Vintage cookers add a timeless Italian flair to any kitchen with brushed steel knobs, curved panels, and cast iron pan supports.
meta.twitterTitle: BULM Vintage Cookers | Retro Italian Freestanding Ranges
meta.twitterDescription: Inspired by the 1950s, BULM Vintage cookers feature soft lines, polished chrome handles, and professional performance.

vintage.title: Classically styled, beautifully made
vintage.description:
Vintage line cookers provide a touch of character to the furnishings with their soft lines, different colours and unmistakable vintage style.
Available as a single oven cooker or with two and three cavities, Elba Vintage cookers are dual fuel, with gas hobs and electric or fan gas ovens.

sections.title: Charming finishing touches
sections.description: Gently curved stainless steel back guards softly rounded paneling on the oven fronts are complemented by retro brushed steel control knobs and matching handrails.

sections.title: Large cooktop with durable cast iron pan supports
sections.description: Stainless steel five-burners gas top. Heavy and durable cast iron and wok supports are included.

sections.title: Vintage knobs
sections.description: Inspired by the original wood-burning stoves that our founder created in 1950, Elba Vintage Cookers are controlled by knobs with stainless steel finishing.

sections.title: Refined details
sections.description: The vintage style is also in the design details, such as the comfortable electronic programmer. In addition, the bright chrome handle is available on all Elba Vintage cookers, as a replica of the handrail found on the original Elba stoves, giving the kitchen a traditional trait.

excellence.title: Excellence Collection — Built to Perform, Designed to Inspire
excellence.description:
With a professional-grade aesthetic and a commitment to performance, the BULM Excellence Series delivers a new standard in freestanding cookers.
Available in both 60cm and 90cm widths, choose between induction or gas hobs, and cook with precision using multifunction electric ovens or dual fuel combinations.

sections.title: Advanced Control Panel
sections.description: Every BULM Excellence cooker features a digital touch control system for precise timing and flexible functionality — tailored to serious cooking needs.

sections.title: Heavy-duty Dual Burners
sections.description: Our brass dual burners ensure excellent durability and uniform heat distribution for any cooking technique.

sections.title: Professional-Grade Knobs
sections.description: The brushed metal knobs with premium detailing give a distinct, modern look — inspired by the most refined professional kitchens.

sections.title: Elegant Handle Finish
sections.description: All appliances in this collection are equipped with a dual-finish handle: brushed steel center with polished chrome ends — a unique BULM signature.

fusion.title: Fusion Collection. Seamless integration into your kitchen.
fusion.description:
Designed to be perfectly combined in the space of your kitchen, Fusion Collection offers freestanding cookers with dual fuel cooktops and gas or electric ovens.
The clean lines of these cookers are designed for seamless integration into any contemporary kitchen design.

sections.title: Simple to use electronic programmer
sections.description: Time and oven functions are controlled by an electronic programmer bringing precision and flexibility to cooking performances.

sections.title: Cast iron pan supports
sections.description: Heavy-duty and durable cast iron pan supports give stability to the pots.

sections.title: Coordinated handle design
sections.description: The brushed metal handles on each appliance are ergonomic and pleasant to use.

sections.title: Double finishing knobs
sections.description: Black soft touch and stainless steel finishing knobs.

classic.title: Classic Collection. Beyond all passing fashion trends
classic.description:
The Classic Collection offers a durable and safe solution for your everyday cooking needs.
The quality of the materials and the traditional made in Italy crafting skills are combined with a sober and simple style.
Single cavity cookers are available in two different widths, 60cm and 90cm wide.

sections.title: Nickel finishing knobs with inner bezel
sections.description: Nickel finishing knobs with inner bezel have a functional and practical style, chosen for their easiness of use.

sections.title: Enamelled steel pan supports
sections.description: Enamelled steel pan supports design gives a seamless and smooth appearance that allows for easy cleaning.

sections.title: Essential style handle
sections.description: Metal handle with brushed finishing on all the Classic Collection Cookers.

collectionsHobs.title: Superior materials meet
collectionsHobs.subtitle: cutting-edge performance
collectionsHobs.description: BULM hobs are crafted from premium materials and built with the latest Italian cooking technology. Available in a variety of shapes, sizes, and methods — gas, induction, glass or vitroceramic — each hob is engineered to pair perfectly with BULM ovens and elevate your cooking experience.

sections.title: Elio Collection
sections.description:
Explore versatility with the Elio Collection, available in three width options: 60cm, 75cm, and 90cm.

Choose from sleek gas on glass-ceramic hobs with electronic controls, classic all-gas options, modern induction, or vitroceramic solutions.

sections.title: Country Collection
sections.description: For those who appreciate a touch of rustic elegance, the Country Collection adds warmth and timeless character to any kitchen. Its textured colors and authentic materials recall the charm of countryside homes — with all the innovation of BULM.

meta.title: BULM Hobs Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
meta.description: Discover BULM's premium hobs: gas, induction, vitroceramic, and more. Designed in Italy for superior performance and seamless kitchen integration.
meta.keywords: BULM hobs, gas hobs, induction hobs, vitroceramic cooktops, glass cooktops, Italian kitchen appliances, modern hobs
meta.ogTitle: BULM Hobs Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops

meta.twitterTitle: BULM Hobs Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
meta.twitterDescription: Versatile, efficient, and beautiful — BULM's Italian-designed hobs offer top-tier cooking performance for modern kitchens.

meta.title: BULM Elio Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.description: Explore BULM's Elio Collection of hobs — premium gas, gas-on-glass, induction and vitroceramic hobs designed with safety, performance, and Italian style.
meta.keywords: Elio hobs, gas hobs, induction hobs, gas on glass hob, vitroceramic hob, BULM Elio collection, kitchen appliances, built-in hobs
meta.ogTitle: BULM Elio Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.ogDescription: Versatile, durable, and beautifully designed — discover BULM Elio hobs in gas, glass, vitroceramic, and induction formats.
meta.twitterTitle: BULM Elio Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.twitterDescription: Discover the latest from BULM's Elio hob series — combining high-end cooking performance with refined Italian design.

elio.title: Elio Collection
elio.description: All Elio hobs are made with top-quality materials and therefore always give above standard results. All are equipped with features for increased safety and performance. There are gas on metal, gas on glass and induction hobs, with four or more burners and even smaller sized or traditional-looking hobs.

sections.title: Gas on metal hobs
sections.description: Smooth edges and minimal design create an exclusive look, Elio gas hobs are crafted using an expressly increased thickness (8/10) to ensure resistance over time. Available in three different sizes: 60cm, 75cm and 90cm.

sections.title: Gas on glass hobs
sections.description: Elio gas on glass hobs are finished in stylish black vitroceramic. With matt black burners and accurate metal finishing knobs: cooking becomes simple, versatile and precise. Available in three different sizes: 60cm, 75cm and 90cm.

sections.title: Gas-matik hob
sections.description: Elio gas-matik hob has a range of additional features: each gas burner can be programmed to turn off after a set period of time or set as a minute minder. Furthermore, this hob features a child lock function and if a burner is in use continuously for 4 hours, the system will automatically shut down. Available in 90cm size.

sections.title: Vitroceramic Elio hobs
sections.description: Easy to clean, Vitroceramic Elio hobs are equipped with a scratch-resistant surface that quickly transmits heat only vertically, from the heating elements placed under the hob directly to traditional pots, thus ensuring good cooking performance. Available in four different sizes: 30cm, 60cm, 78m and 90cm.

sections.title: Induction Elio hobs
sections.description: With their essential design, Elio induction hobs, thanks to the built-in compatibility with any space, can be easily installed both in case of replacement and first installation. Their special functions, such as Chef Cook, Full bridge and Melting, give you the possibility to increase your talent for cooking. Available in different sizes: 30cm, 60cm, 70cm, 75cm, 80cm and 90cm.

meta.title: BULM Country Hobs Collection | Rustic Elegance & Modern Performance
meta.description: Discover BULM's Country Collection hobs — combining rustic charm with modern technology. Perfect for those who appreciate timeless design and superior cooking performance.
meta.keywords: Country hobs, rustic hobs, traditional hobs, BULM Country collection, kitchen appliances, gas hobs, induction hobs

country.title: Country Collection
country.description: The Country Collection brings the warmth and character of traditional countryside homes to modern kitchens. With textured finishes and authentic materials, these hobs combine rustic elegance with cutting-edge BULM technology.

sections.title: Traditional Design
sections.description: Inspired by classic countryside kitchens, the Country Collection features warm textures and authentic materials that create a welcoming atmosphere.

sections.title: Modern Performance
sections.description: Despite their traditional appearance, Country hobs feature the latest BULM technology for superior cooking performance and safety.

sections.title: Versatile Options
sections.description: Available in gas, induction, and vitroceramic formats, the Country Collection offers solutions for every cooking preference and kitchen style.

collectionsOvens.title: Built-in
collectionsOvens.subtitle: Where Italian craftsmanship meets modern innovation
collectionsOvens.description: Discover the elegance of BULM built-in ovens — where iconic Italian design meets advanced cooking technology. Available in both 60cm and 90cm formats, our ovens offer gas or electric multifunction options and feature innovations such as Easy Steam, true fan cooking, and more.

sections.title: Elio
sections.description: Elio Collection has simple, minimalist lines in an exclusive style. Easy Steam and Idroclean special functions ensure high performance and excellent cooking results.

sections.title: Elio Giant
sections.description: Gas or multifunction electric, all 90cm Elio Giant built-in ovens feature 141 litres gross volume, for no space limits with even more possibilities without wasting time.

sections.title: Country
sections.description: Country Collection built-in ovens are the ideal solution for giving the interior spaces the atmosphere that especially recalls the houses of the countryside.

sections.title: Professional
sections.description: The beautifully designed Professional collection offers professional performance for your kitchen at home.

sections.title: Alterum
sections.description: Alterum Collection has simple, minimalist lines in an exclusive style; an elegant and discreet design.

sections.title: Easy Steam Function

sections.title: Idroclean System

elioGiant.description: The Elio Giant Collection offers the ultimate in cooking capacity and versatility. With 141 litres of gross volume in a 90cm format, these ovens provide unlimited possibilities for large families, entertaining, and ambitious cooking projects.

sections.title: Maximum Capacity

sections.title: Dual Fuel Options

professional.description: The Professional Collection brings the performance and capabilities of commercial kitchens to your home. Beautifully designed with advanced features, these ovens offer the precision and power that serious home chefs demand.

sections.title: Professional Performance

alterum.title: Alterum Collection
alterum.description: The Alterum Collection embodies the philosophy that true elegance lies in simplicity. With clean, minimalist lines and an exclusive style, these ovens offer sophisticated design that complements any kitchen without overwhelming the space.

sections.title: Minimalist Design
sections.description: Simple, clean lines create an exclusive style that emphasizes functionality and understated elegance.

sections.title: Discreet Presence
sections.description: Elegant and discreet design ensures these ovens enhance your kitchen without dominating the space.

sections.title: Sophisticated Functionality
sections.description: Advanced cooking features are seamlessly integrated into the minimalist design for optimal performance.

collections_hobs.page_title: BULM Hobs Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
collections_hobs.page_description: Discover BULM's premium hobs: gas, induction, vitroceramic, and more. Designed in Italy for superior performance and seamless kitchen integration.
collections_hobs.meta_keywords: BULM hobs, gas hobs, induction hobs, vitroceramic cooktops, glass cooktops, Italian kitchen appliances, modern hobs
collections_hobs.og_description: Premium Italian hobs crafted from the finest materials. Explore gas, induction, and vitroceramic cooktops from BULM.
collections_hobs.twitter_description: Versatile, efficient, and beautiful — BULM's Italian-designed hobs offer top-tier cooking performance for modern kitchens.

layout.title: Superior materials meet
layout.subtitle: cutting-edge performance
layout.description: BULM hobs are crafted from premium materials and built with the latest Italian cooking technology. Available in a variety of shapes, sizes, and methods — gas, induction, glass or vitroceramic — each hob is engineered to pair perfectly with BULM ovens and elevate your cooking experience.

elio.title: Elio Collection
elio.description:
Explore versatility with the Elio Collection, available in three width options: 60cm, 75cm, and 90cm.

Choose from sleek gas on glass-ceramic hobs with electronic controls, classic all-gas options, modern induction, or vitroceramic solutions.

country.title: Country Collection
country.description: For those who appreciate a touch of rustic elegance, the Country Collection adds warmth and timeless character to any kitchen. Its textured colors and authentic materials recall the charm of countryside homes — with all the innovation of BULM.

meta.title: BULM Country Hobs Collection | Rustic Elegance in Your Kitchen
meta.description: Explore BULM's Country Collection of hobs — crafted with traditional design, antiqued brass knobs, and rustic charm to bring countryside warmth into your kitchen.
meta.keywords: Country kitchen hobs, rustic hobs, BULM country collection, brass knobs, traditional gas hobs, countryside kitchen appliances
meta.og_description: Authentic and charming, BULM's Country Collection hobs blend traditional style with modern performance.
meta.twitter_description: Designed for those who appreciate countryside aesthetics — discover BULM's Country hobs with antique brass finishes and timeless style.

main.title: Country Collection. Inspired by tradition
main.description: For those who love a touch of "country chic" style in the kitchen and prefer the nuances of material colors, Country Collection hobs are the ideal solution, giving the interior spaces the atmosphere that especially recalls the houses of countryside.

section.title: Country design
section.description: The country aesthetic is enhanced by the characteristic knobs, all rigorously in antiqued brass; the gold-colored serigraphies reproduce a old-fashion design in balance between tradition and innovation.

meta.title: BULM Elio Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.description: Explore BULM's Elio Collection of hobs — premium gas, gas-on-glass, induction and vitroceramic hobs designed with safety, performance, and Italian style.
meta.keywords: Elio hobs, gas hobs, induction hobs, gas on glass hob, vitroceramic hob, BULM Elio collection, kitchen appliances, built-in hobs
meta.og_description: Versatile, durable, and beautifully designed — discover BULM Elio hobs in gas, glass, vitroceramic, and induction formats.
meta.twitter_description: Discover the latest from BULM's Elio hob series — combining high-end cooking performance with refined Italian design.

main.title: Elio Collection
main.description: All Elio hobs are made with top-quality materials and therefore always give above standard results. All are equipped with features for increased safety and performance. There are gas on metal, gas on glass and induction hobs, with four or more burners and even smaller sized or traditional-looking hobs.

1.title: Gas on metal hobs
1.description: Smooth edges and minimal design create an exclusive look, Elio gas hobs are crafted using an expressly increased thickness (8/10) to ensure resistance over time. Available in three different sizes: 60cm, 75cm and 90cm

2.title: Gas on glass hobs
2.description: Elio gas on glass hobs are finished in stylish black vitroceramic. With matt black burners and accurate metal finishing knobs: cooking becomes simple, versatile and precise. Available in three different sizes: 60cm, 75cm and 90cm.

3.title: Gas-matik hob
3.description: Elio gas-matik hob has a range of additional features: each gas burner can be programmed to turn off after a set period of time or set as a minute minder. Furthermore, this hob features a child lock function and if a burner is in use continuously for 4 hours, the system will automatically shut down. Available in 90cm size.

4.title: Vitroceramic Elio hobs
4.description: Easy to clean, Vitroceramic Elio hobs are equipped with a scratch-resistant surface that quickly transmits heat only vertically, from the heating elements placed under the hob directly to traditional pots, thus ensuring good cooking performance. Available in four different sizes: 30cm, 60cm, 78cm and 90cm.

5.title: Induction Elio hobs
5.description: With their essential design, Elio induction hobs, thanks to the built-in compatibility with any space, can be easily installed both in case of replacement and first installation. Their special functions, such as Chef Cook, Full bridge and Melting, give you the possibility to increase your talent for cooking. Available in different sizes: 30cm, 60cm, 70cm, 75cm, 80cm and 90cm.

collections_ovens.title: Built-in
collections_ovens.subtitle: Where Italian craftsmanship meets modern innovation
collections_ovens.description: Discover the elegance of BULM built-in ovens — where iconic Italian design meets advanced cooking technology. Available in both 60cm and 90cm formats, our ovens offer gas or electric multifunction options and feature innovations such as Easy Steam, true fan cooking, and more.

sections.title: Elio
sections.description: Elio Collection has simple, minimalist lines in an exclusive style. Easy Steam and Idroclean special functions ensure high performance and excellent cooking results.

sections.title: Elio Giant
sections.description: Gas or multifunction electric, all 90cm Elio Giant built-in ovens feature 141 litres gross volume, for no space limits with even more possibilities without wasting time.

sections.title: Country
sections.description: Country Collection built-in ovens are the ideal solution for giving the interior spaces the atmosphere that especially recalls the houses of the countryside.

sections.title: Professional
sections.description: The beautifully designed Professional collection offers professional performance for your kitchen at home.

sections.description: Alterum Collection has simple, minimalist lines in an exclusive style; an elegant and discreet design.

seo.title: Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Discover BULM's built-in ovens: a perfect blend of Italian design and advanced cooking technology. Available in gas or electric, with features like Easy Steam, fan cooking, and more.

alterum_ovens.title: Alterum Collection. Minimalist lines in a sober style
alterum_ovens.description: Alterum Collection has simple, minimalist lines in an exclusive style; an elegant and sober design.

sections.title: Easy Steam
sections.description: By evaporating water inside the oven, the Easy Steam function helps food to be better cooked compared to the same cooking without the addition of humidity.

sections.title: Idroclean
sections.description: Without using any type of detergent, this function helps remove the dirt inside the oven thanks to the moisture generated by the water warming at 80-90°C.

seo.title: Country Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy

seo.title: Elio Giant Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Discover BULM’s Elio Giant built-in ovens — 90cm gas or electric multifunction ovens with massive 141L capacity, dual fans, rotisserie, and advanced features for seamless cooking.

seo.og_description: Experience no space limits with BULM Elio Giant ovens. Choose between powerful gas or multifunction electric ovens for high-performance cooking.

elio_giant_ovens.title: Elio Giant Collection. A huge space with more power and performance
elio_giant_ovens.description: Imagine having no space limits with even more possibilities; a perfect result in every condition without wasting time.

sections.title: Giant electric multifunction ovens
sections.description: Choose from electric multifunction ovens. Whichever finish you prefer, all 90cm Giant Ovens feature 141 litres gross volume and 121 usable litres with 7 racks positions, varied cooking programs including rapid pre-heat and 2 fans for full 3D cooking experience.

sections.title: Giant gas ovens
sections.description: A unique feature of Giant gas ovens is the fan gas oven and full-width, all gas grill. It is a powerful combination offering heat control and flexibility. Stainless steel rotisserie kit which, when needed, can fit across the full width of the oven and features a double fork setting.

seo.title: Elio Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Discover the Elio built-in oven collection from BULM – featuring Easy Steam, Idroclean, and Gas-Matik functions. Sleek design and exceptional performance in every bake.
seo.keywords: Elio ovens, BULM built-in ovens, multifunction ovens, electric ovens, Easy Steam oven, Idroclean oven, Gas-Matik, Italian kitchen appliances
seo.og_description: Experience seamless design and innovative cooking with BULM’s Elio built-in ovens. Crafted for performance with cutting-edge features like Easy Steam and Idroclean.

elio_ovens.title: Elio Collection. Seamless integration between style and efficiency
elio_ovens.description: Innovation and appeal are revealed in the Elio built-in models. Top-quality materials, designed with the latest generation technology, such as Easy Steam and Idroclean functions, ensure high performances and excellent cooking results. Elio Collection has simple, ergonomic lines in an exclusive style.

sections.title: Large oven cavity
sections.description: 74 usable litres (86 gross litres), with 7 levels positioning side racks, perfect for your multilevel preparations.

sections.title: Easy Steam
sections.description: By evaporating water inside the oven, the Easy Steam function helps food to be better cooked adding the right degree of humidity.

sections.title: Gas-matik hob
sections.description: Elio gas-matik hob has a range of additional features: each gas burner can be programmed to turn off after a set period of time or set as a minute minder. Furthermore, this hob features a child lock function and if a burner is in use continuously for 4 hours, the system will automatically shut down. Available in 90cm size.

sections.title: Idroclean
sections.description: Without using any type of detergent, this function helps remove the dirt inside the oven thanks to the moisture generated by the water heating at 80-90°C.

seo.title: Professional Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Explore BULM's Professional built-in ovens collection – high-performance ovens with premium features like Easy Steam, Idroclean, Pizza300°C, and Leavening 40°C.
seo.keywords: Professional ovens, BULM built-in ovens, electric multifunction oven, Easy Steam, Idroclean, Pizza 300°C, Leavening 40°C, large oven cavity, Italian kitchen appliances
seo.og_description: Experience BULM’s Professional ovens – built for power, precision, and performance. Discover advanced cooking features for your modern kitchen.

professional_ovens.title: Professional Collection. Professional performance for your kitchen
professional_ovens.description: The Professional collection offers professional performances for your kitchen at home. Its distinctive style features elegant knobs and ergonomically designed handles, capacity, flexibility and usability with dedicated special functions such as Easy Steam and Idroclean.

sections.title: Easy Steam
sections.description: Easy Steam By evaporating water inside the oven, the Easy Steam function helps food to be better cooked compared to the same cooking without the addition of humidity.

sections.title: Idroclean
sections.description: Without using any type of detergent, this function helps remove the dirt inside the oven thanks to the moisture generated by the water warming at 80-90°C.

sections.title: Leavening 40°C
sections.description: Built to last and to deal with the demands of daily cooking, these high specification ovens feature the function of Leavening at 40°C by which the dough maintains its characteristics, allowing optimal leavening.

sections.title: Special function Pizza300°C
sections.description: The exclusive Pizza special function with its 300°C allows you to cook your pizza perfectly as in a real professional oven. The upper heating element and the fan turn on. The heat coming from the bottom is diffused by forced convection.

sections.title: Large oven cavity
sections.description: 74 usable liters (86 gross liters) with 7 levels with easier to remove side racks for your multilevel preparations.

seo.title: BULM Timeline – An Italian Success Story
seo.description: Discover the inspiring history of BULM – from a small idea in 1979 to a global name in premium kitchen appliances.
seo.keywords: BULM timeline, company history, Italian appliances, kitchen innovation, cooking evolution
seo.og_title: BULM Timeline – An Italian Success Story
seo.og_description: Explore how BULM redefined kitchens over decades through design, innovation, and Italian craftsmanship.

entries.title: The Beginning
entries.content: In 1979, BULM began its journey as a small initiative with a bold vision — to redefine the cooking experience. Born from a passion for craftsmanship and quality, the brand started producing durable, elegant cooking appliances for everyday use.

entries.title: Early Expansion
entries.content: With growing demand for refined appliances, BULM expanded its production lines to include integrated kitchen solutions. Every product reflected a dedication to precision and design excellence.

entries.title: Innovation Driven
entries.content: In the 1990s, the company focused on innovation — combining smart features with stylish aesthetics. This period marked BULM’s rise as a leading name in high-end European kitchen appliances.

entries.title: Global Reach
entries.content: BULM entered international markets, offering its signature Italian flair to kitchens around the world. The brand became synonymous with reliability, performance, and timeless design.

entries.title: Future Forward
entries.content: Today, BULM continues to innovate by integrating smart technologies and sustainable materials — empowering modern lifestyles and shaping the future of kitchen living.
